params.asset: address of the token to get the power
params.blockHash: block hash of when we want to get the power. Optional parameter
params.power: balance of a determined asset to be used for the vote
params.storageSlot: storage position of the balance mapping

returns._0: voting power of the specified asset

params.blockHash: hash of the block from where the roots have been registered.

DATA_WAREHOUSE().notice: method to get the DataWarehouse contract

POWER_SCALE_FACTOR().notice: method to get the power scale factor of the delegated balances

STK_AAVE_SLASHING_EXCHANGE_RATE_PRECISIO.notice: method to get the exchange rate precision. Taken from stkTokenV3 contract

STK_AAVE_SLASHING_EXCHANGE_RATE_SLOT().notice: method to get the slot of the stkAave exchange rate in the stkAave contract

getVotingPower(address,uint128,uint256,b.notice: method to get the power of an asset

hasRequiredRoots(bytes32).notice: method to check that the roots for all the tokens in the voting strategy have been registered. Including the registry of the stkAave exchange rate slot

documentation.text:
@notice method to get the DataWarehouse contract
 @return DataWarehouse contract

@notice method to get the exchange rate precision. Taken from stkTokenV3 contract
 @return exchange rate precission

@notice method to get the slot of the stkAave exchange rate in the stkAave contract
 @return stkAave exchange rate slot

@notice method to get the power scale factor of the delegated balances
 @return power scale factor
